author.title: A Journey from Finance to Legacy
author.bio_p1: Born in Ponce, Puerto Rico, Jacqueline Jiménez spent over two decades in the corporate world before answering her own "call to adventure." In 2019, she transitioned to entrepreneurship as a certified Life Coach, fulfilling a mission to help others unlock their potential and define their own legacies.
author.bio_p2_post: , applies the Hero’s Journey framework to the lives of twelve extraordinary Puerto Rican women. Merging self-discovery with cultural identity, Jacqueline writes to celebrate the island's unbreakable spirit, proving that our roots are our power and our heritage is our crown.
